title: Banor Group
subtitle: One Mission. Three Engines.
description: An integrated redevelopment ecosystem—workforce, redevelopment, and capital working together to transform neighborhoods.
intro: We train the workforce. We rehabilitate properties. We deploy capital. Together, we scale community transformation.

sections.title: Integrated Redevelopment Ecosystem
sections.content: Banor Group unifies workforce development, property rehabilitation, and impact investment into a single, closed-loop system. No fragmented programs. No disconnected capital. One mission. Three engines.

sections.title: The Ecosystem Explained
sections.subtitle: Foundation → Development → Capital → reinvest into communities

items.title: Foundation
items.description: Youth trade training, certification tracks, and employment pathways into development.

items.title: Development
items.description: Property acquisition, rehabilitation, and neighborhood stabilization.

items.title: Capital
items.description: Impact investment, blended capital, and scalable deployment across cities.

items.title: Reinvest
items.description: Project returns flow back into Foundation programs and new Development projects. The model scales.

steps.title: Train

steps.title: Build
steps.description: Development acquires and rehabilitates vacant properties, creating jobs.

steps.title: Fund
steps.description: Capital attracts impact investors and scales the model across cities.

steps.title: Scale
